title: What are the rarest VHS tapes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chester N. Turner's 1987 horror film 'Tales From the Quadead Zone' is said to be the rarest movie released on VHS. A copy of it went for just over $1000 on eBay in 2013. The Sun Video release of 'Last House on Dead End Street' is a runner-up, with multiple copies having sold for around $500.
